code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{GlobalContext}from'../context/GlobalState';const IncomeExpenses=()=>{const _useContext=useContext(GlobalContext),transactions=_useContext.transactions;const amounts=transactions.map(transaction=>transaction.amount);const income=amounts.filter(item=>item>0).reduce((acc,amount)=>acc+=amount,0).toFixed(2);const expense=amounts.filter(item=>item<0).reduce((acc,amount)=>acc+=amount,0)*-1 .toFixed(2);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"row card-body shadow"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"col-sm border text-center pt-3"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",{className:"text-success"},"Income"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"money plus"},"$",income)),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"col-sm border text-center pt-3"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",{className:"text-danger"},"Expense"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"money minus"},"$",expense)));};export default IncomeExpenses;
